name: Web-trivia
body:
### Web:Trivia
* Enjoy the a series of trivia challenges with your web analysis skills.
* Related topics including **"client side validation"**, **"cookie"** and so on


***
* This repo is a part of the project [SRCTF](http://tunablectf.com)
* To use this challenge sequence, please make sure you have set up the server [framework](https://github.com/nsslab-yin/SRCTF), then follow the instructions to import the challenge contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
